Uses of Class
edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack.Player

    • Uses of Player in edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack

      Methods in edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player Blackjack.getDealer()
      returns reference to dealer Player
      Player Blackjack.getPlayer(int index)
      returns reference to Player within players ArrayList according to index
      Player Blackjack.getPlayerE()
      returns reference to Player in East
      Player Blackjack.getPlayerS()
      returns reference to Player in South
      Player Blackjack.getPlayerW()
      returns reference to Player in West
      Methods in edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char Blackjack.evaluateWinner(Player player)
      evaluates the winner of the game
      boolean Blackjack.playerHasBlackjack(Player player)
      returns true if player passed to method has blackjack
      Card Blackjack.playerHit(Player player)
      makes the player passed as a parameter hit and returns a reference to the card drawn so it can be displayed
